entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who will run into the forest, right at the narrator and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is gasping in shock and worrying about where to hide from the dementors.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is being untied by Hermione, and then runs along behind them as they flee.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's empty cabin is mentioned as a potential place to hide from the dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The dementors are coming and Hermione is worried about them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry suggests going back to Hagrid's cabin as a place to hide from the dementors.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang, the boarhound, is barking loudly after they enter the cabin.

relationships.description: Harry suggests going back to Hagrid's empty cabin as a place to hide from the dementors.
Hermione is untieing Buckbeak and then runs along behind them as they flee.
Harry, Hermione, and Buckbeak are running together to escape the dementors.
